author: tmill
msg: Removed unused dependencies that were causing compiler errors.

author: markt
msg: Upgraded connections need to be marked as upgraded earlier so any poller events triggered are passed to the upgrade processor.

The call to WebConnection.init() needs to occur after the connection has been marked as upgraded to ensure that any events triggered by the init() code are processed as part of the upgraded connection.

author: alg
msg: i122594 correctly handle iner svg node when no width/height or percent is given
